LanguageData.AA_AteSuperAwfulMeal.stages.0.label: ate incredibly awful meal
LanguageData.AA_AteSuperAwfulMeal.stages.0.descriptio: I had to eat something that was processed in the guts of a biomechanical abomination. I haven't eaten a more disgusting meal in my whole life.
LanguageData.AA_AteHorribleRot.stages.0.label: ate fermented rotting vegetation
LanguageData.AA_AteHorribleRot.stages.0.description: I had to scavenge fermented rotting vegetation to survive. This was worse than eating a corpse. The end is near.
LanguageData.AA_UncomfortablyHot.stages.0.label: ate terrible wasp eggs
LanguageData.AA_UncomfortablyHot.stages.0.description: I ate food with terrible wasp eggs. They burned my mouth and the burning sensation doesn't go away!.
LanguageData.AA_BeenPsionicallyNuzzled.stages.0.label: psionically nuzzled
LanguageData.AA_BeenPsionicallyNuzzled.stages.0.descr: That pretty fox sure seems to know how to make you feel loved...
LanguageData.AA_Disgust.stages.0.label: disgusting creature
LanguageData.AA_Disgust.stages.0.description: I witnessed a revolting giant slug reeking of the stench of corpse bile. I want to puke.
LanguageData.AA_PsychicHarmonyGood.stages.0.label: psychic harmony (good)
LanguageData.AA_PsychicHarmonyGood.stages.0.descripti: A Grey-Coated Mouflon nearby is well fed and cared for.
LanguageData.AA_PsychicHarmonyBad.stages.0.label: psychic harmony (bad)
LanguageData.AA_PsychicHarmonyBad.stages.0.descriptio: A Grey-Coated Mouflon nearby is angry or hurt, creating psychic waves of agony that are extremely distracting...
I feel bloated, as if my whole body had been suddenly filled with gas.
I am a disgusting, exploding ball of gas!
I can float above obstacles, but I still feel as if my whole body was bloated.
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetRevertedMemory.stages.0.desc: Oh, I can feel my internal organs again...
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetRevertedMemory.stages.1.desc: I miss being able to float all over!
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetRevertedMemory.stages.2.desc: Gods, I don't miss being a ball of explosive gas...
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetRevertedMemory.stages.3.desc: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetEyes.stages.0.label: Gasbag face
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetEyes.stages.0.description: Eugh, I can't get used to having four eyes.
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetEyes.stages.1.label: Gasbag face
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetEyes.stages.2.label: Gasbag face
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetEyes.stages.2.description: Nobody is gonna want to kiss this face! And the constant squishing sound is disgusting!
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetFuzz.stages.0.label: Fuzz everywhere
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetFuzz.stages.0.description: A disgusting blue fuzz is growing all over my body!
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetFuzz.stages.1.label: Fuzz everywhere
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetFuzz.stages.1.description: With this blue fuzz I suddenly feel very protected.
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetFuzz.stages.2.label: Fuzz everywhere
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetFuzz.stages.2.description: This thin blue fuzz is horribly disgusting! It itches!
LanguageData.AA_HelixienTransformationMemory.stages.0: I'm slimy, and my mouth waters upsettingly every time I see a dead thing.
LanguageData.AA_HelixienTransformationMemory.stages.2: Helixiens are disgusting enough as it is, now I have to see one every time I look in the mirror!
LanguageData.AA_HelixienTransformationMemory.stages.3: I'm kind of digging the wild field of vision, but people keep making salt jokes around me.
LanguageData.AA_HelixienRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.AA_HelixienRevertedMemory.stages.0.descr: I'm dry again, and my eyes are back where nature intended.
LanguageData.AA_HelixienRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.AA_HelixienRevertedMemory.stages.1.descr: Eugh, corpses smell so bad now, and my skin feels so dry!
LanguageData.AA_HelixienRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.AA_HelixienRevertedMemory.stages.2.descr: No more wool! Oh, skin, how I missed seeing you...
LanguageData.AA_HelixienRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.AA_HelixienRevertedMemory.stages.3.descr: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.AA_HelixienFace.stages.0.label: Slug face
LanguageData.AA_HelixienFace.stages.0.description: Eugh, the way these eyestalks swing around makes me feel queasy.
LanguageData.AA_HelixienFace.stages.1.label: Slug face
LanguageData.AA_HelixienFace.stages.2.label: Slug face
LanguageData.AA_HelixienFace.stages.2.description: Nobody is gonna want to kiss this face! And with this rasping tongue I don't blame them!
LanguageData.AA_HelixienTail.stages.0.label: Slug tail
LanguageData.AA_HelixienTail.stages.0.description: Do you have any idea how much lint gets stuck to this thing?
LanguageData.AA_HelixienTail.stages.1.label: Slug tail
LanguageData.AA_HelixienTail.stages.1.description: Scientifically speaking it's actually a large foot, but either way I can surf around on slime with it. Kowabunga!
LanguageData.AA_HelixienTail.stages.2.label: Slug tail
LanguageData.AA_HelixienTail.stages.2.description: There's a loathesome bag of goo growing out of me, how do you think I feel?
LanguageData.AA_HelixienSkin.stages.0.label: Slimy skin
LanguageData.AA_HelixienSkin.stages.0.description: The leopard spots are kinda nice, but the slime? Not so much.
LanguageData.AA_HelixienSkin.stages.1.label: Slimy skin
LanguageData.AA_HelixienSkin.stages.1.description: It's awesome how the slight shines through the translucent surface, like slimy stained glass!
LanguageData.AA_HelixienSkin.stages.2.label: Slimy skin
LanguageData.AA_HelixienSkin.stages.2.description: Oh god, this is one worse than leprosy!
LanguageData.AA_SoakingWetHelixien.stages.0.label: soaking wet (lubricated)
LanguageData.AA_SoakingWetHelixien.stages.0.descripti: I'm soaking wet. This feels so good.
LanguageData.AA_ObservedLayingCorpseHelixien.stages.0: I saw a dead body laying on the ground. It was mouth-watering.
LanguageData.AA_ObservedLayingRottingCorpseHelixien.s: I saw a rotting corpse laying on the ground. I want to feast on its rotten entrails and slurp its delicious corpse juice.
LanguageData.AA_WitnessedDeathAllyHelixien.stages.0.d: I saw one of my people die. They were alive one moment, and dead the next. I wonder if they'll let me gently nibble their corpse...
I saw someone die. They were alive one moment, and dead the next. Uh... Is anyone going to eat that?
LanguageData.AA_ColonistLeftUnburiedHelixien.stages.0: One of us died and we're just leaving them lying in the open. I wonder if they'll let me alone enough time to sneak around and feast on the corpse...
LanguageData.AA_OcularTrees_TreesDesired.stages.0.des: There are no ocular trees around, and I feel nervous being outside of their soothing gaze
LanguageData.AA_OcularTrees_TreesDesired.stages.1.des: There are very few ocular trees around.
LanguageData.AA_OcularTrees_TreesDesired.stages.2.des: I recently saw a wide variety of ocular trees.
LanguageData.AA_OcularTrees_TreesDesired.stages.3.des: I am surrounded by several beautiful, massive ocular trees. Their unblinking gaze is glorious!
LanguageData.AA_OcularTrees_TreesDesired.stages.4.des: The whole region is covered in the sublime gaze of the ocular trees - a physical seat of morality!
